text: Stethopachys formosa (orchid beetle or dendrobium beetle) is an Australian insect found in New South Wales and Queensland. This insect feeds on the flowers and leaves of orchids, often causing damage to cultivated plants. ==References== Category:Chrysomelidae Category:Beetles described in 1861 Category:Beetles of Australia Category:Orchid ecology Category:Taxa named by Joseph Sugar Baly
title: Stethopachys formosa
